page.title: 15Area events,summer 1985.
page.content: hursday 25th July. Diana,Princess of Wales visited the Royal Marine Training Camp at Lympstone today,luckily one of the few fine days of this cool and wet summer.She arrived by helicopter before lunch and was shown by the Commandment.Security was tight, police helicopters kept a constant watch.After meeting staff and their families for lunch,she watched Physical Training displays.The main purpose of her visit was to meet the young recruits and their parents.Then she was flown to Woodbury Common to see Marines in action.The visit was kept as informal as possible but alot of work went into the preparation. Princes Andrew and Edward both trained at this camp.
